mapper.select: SELECT t1.MENU_CD FROM BASE_MENU t1 left join BASE_ROLE_ATUTH t2 on T1.MENU_CD = T2.MENU_CD where t1.IS_USE='1' AND T2.ROLE_ID =#{roleId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} order by t1.order_by

SELECT t1.SYS_NM,t1.MENU_CD,t1.MENU_NM,t1.MENU_TYPE,t1.MENU_URL,t1.PMENU_CD,t1.REMARK, t1.ICON_FILE,t1.ORDER_BY,t1.IS_USE,t1.JSP_URL FROM BASE_MENU t1 where t1.IS_USE='1' and MENU_TYPE!='3' and t1.PMENU_CD is null order by t1.order_by

SELECT t1.SYS_NM,t1.MENU_CD,t1.MENU_NM,t1.MENU_TYPE,t1.MENU_URL,t1.PMENU_CD,t1.REMARK, t1.ICON_FILE,t1.ORDER_BY,t1.IS_USE,t1.JSP_URL FROM BASE_MENU t1 where t1.IS_USE='1' and MENU_TYPE!='3' START WITH t1.MENU_CD=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} CONNECT BY PRIOR t1.MENU_CD = t1.PMENU_CD order by t1.order_by

SELECT t1.SYS_NM,t1.MENU_CD,t1.MENU_NM,t1.MENU_TYPE,t1.MENU_URL,t1.PMENU_CD,t1.REMARK, t1.ICON_FILE,t1.ORDER_BY,t1.IS_USE,t1.JSP_URL FROM BASE_MENU t1 START WITH t1.PMENU_CD is null CONNECT BY PRIOR t1.MENU_CD = t1.PMENU_CD order by t1.order_by
